text: Practice Problem 2.40 (solution page 192) For each of the following values of K, find ways to cxpress x + K using only the specified number of operations, where we consider both additions and subtrac- tions to have comparable cost. You may need to use some tricks beyond the simple form A and B rules we have considered so far. K Shifts — Add/Subs — Expression 7 1 1 30 4 3 æ3 2 1 s 2 2
